description:
Serious warmth for smaller members of the family. Crafted from windproof, waterproof-breathable DryVent™, this insulated snowsuit gives the littlest members of the family the same cold weather protection as the adults. Different weights of insulation focus warmth where it is needed most.

  • 2-layer DryVent™ recycled polyester has a DWR treatment to shed snow and mud
  • Insulated with 250g Heatseeker Eco synthetic insulation in body and 160g in sleeves and hood
  • Insulated 3-piece hood seals in warmth
  • Full-length front zip makes loading and unloading easy
  • Elastic binding on hood, cuffs and hems seal out drafts
  • Ankle gaiters seal over boots and keep out snow
  • Internal ID label makes daycare pick-ups a little smoother
  • EZ Grow hem system lets you undo a line of stitching at the ankle to add an extra 2in. to the inseam
name: The North Face Freedom Snow Suit - Children
